pageProduct.name: OGX Biotin & Collagen Conditioner 750ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

Information

General Information

OGX Thick & Full + Biotin & Collagen Conditioner is an exclusive blend with Vitamin B7 biotin, collagen, and hydrolyzed wheat protein, helps to infuse nutrients into every strand and creates the appearance of thicker, fuller, healthier looking hair.

Sulfate Free Surfactants Hair Care System (Includes Shampoo and Conditioner)

Why You Want It... Discover thicker, fuller and more abundant looking strands! Helps to thicken and texturize any hair type! Immerse your skinny strands in this super volumizing blend to help create fuller looking, shiny hair!

Size: 750mL

Shelf Life in Days: 1095 days

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs rinse immediately. For best results use in conjunction with other OGX products.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Cetearyl Alcohol, Cyclopentasiloxane, Behentrimonium Chloride, Dimethicone, Biotin, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Ethyltrimonium Chloride Methacrylate/Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein Copolymer, Dimethiconol, Polyquaternium-37, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Cetyl Alcohol, PPG-1 Trideceth-6, Isopropyl Alcohol, Citric Acid, DMDM Hydantoin, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Magnesium Chloride, Magnesium Nitrate, Fragrance (Parfum), Ext. Violet 2 (CI 60730), Red 33 (CI 17200).

Directions

What You Do... After shampooing, apply conditioner generously to hair, working through to ends. Wait 3-5 minutes. Rinse hair thoroughly.
